titleStmt.title: The saints interest in God opened in severall sermons, preached anniversarily upon the fifth of November. By John Goodwin pastor of S. Stephens Coleman-street.
titleStmt.author: Goodwin, John, 1594?-1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M. F[lesher]for Henry Overton, and are to be sold at his shop at the entring into Popes Head Alley, out of Lumbard Street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the entring into Popes Head Alley, out of Lumbard Street
